instructions.tip: The goal of this game is to arrange the numbers such that the each row and column have the appropriate sums.

The white number before each row/column is the target value for that group. The numbers after each row and column show you the current value (red=incorrect, green=correct). Switch the numbers around by dragging and dropping until all rows and columns are correct.
Your score is based on how many moves it takes you to finish the board and how quickly you do it.
Each round the grid grows and the range of numbers increases.
